mapper.select: SELECT t.TABLE_SCHEMA AS 'database', t.TABLE_NAME AS 'table', t.ENGINE AS `engine` FROM information_schema.`TABLES` AS t WHERE t.TABLE_SCHEMA NOT IN ('sys', 'information_schema', 'performance_schema', 'mysql') AND t.ENGINE = #{engine}
